titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Special Divisional Major, Yale College, Student Records
Special Divisional Major, Yale College, student records
titlestmt.author: complied by Michael Lotstein

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:46

did.unittitle: Special Divisional Major, Yale College, student records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The student records consist of transcripts, correspondence, and applications to the Committee on Honors and Academic Standing Projects, which oversees the Special Divisional Major program.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Special Divisional Major, Yale College, Student Records (RU 1114). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The records were transferred from Calhoun College, 2011.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged chronologically by academic year.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 9-F (YRG 9-F), Yale College student records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The student records consist of transcripts, correspondence, and applications to the Committee on Honors and Academic Standing, which oversees the Special Divisional Major program. A Special Divisional Major provides an alternative for students whose academic goals cannot be met by an existing department or special major.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Additional information is provided in the finding aid.

did.unittitle: Student records for the Classes of 1975, 1980-1989

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Text in parentheses indicate the student's residential college.
